title: KDSPY Tutorial & Review 2024 - Amazon KDP Keyword Research

tactics.name: Category Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate Amazon categories using KD Spy's traffic light system to assess popularity, competition, and potential.
steps: Install KD Spy plugin on Amazon
Search for a category or keyword
Analyze BSR, sales estimates, and reviews
Use ChatGPT prompts for deeper insights
source_quotes: 'Traffic light that helps you to understand if this is a good category to start selling books'

tactics.name: Keyword Research
tactics.description: Identify high-performing keywords for book optimization using KD Spy's keyword cloud and export features.
steps: Integrate with ChatGPT for content ideas
source_quotes: 'Keyword research in here which is very useful for positioning your books on this platform'

tactics.name: KDSPY Analysis
tactics.description: Use KDSPY to analyze book strengths/weaknesses and compare traditional vs AI methods
caveats: When AI analysis fails to identify key patterns
source_quotes: it's going to give me a quick introduction and then I can see the strength and the weaknesses of this book

heuristics.name: Review Threshold Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with high keyword potential
source_quotes: 'Low review counts can indicate underserved niches'

heuristics.name: AI Efficiency Boost
heuristics.condition: If traditional methods require manual analysis, then AI provides faster insights
source_quotes: the new method is faster because AI does most of the work

claims.statement: KD Spy provides sales estimates and keyword analysis for Amazon KDP authors.
source_quotes: 'K Spy provides estimates of monthly sales volume... to optimize their listing'

claims.statement: KDSPY offers a 65% discount with exclusive link ($69 vs $197)
source_quotes: you can get a 65% of discount reducing the price to only $69

niche_patterns.description: Target specific demographics with unique constraints for niche differentiation.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (target audience), problem (ADHD), and constraint (Christian values) for focused marketing.
